title: Alistair's Party Mansion
data:
***Version [0.30](/0.30 "0.30")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

- *This page is a **[stub](/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. You could probably [expand this page](http://crawl.chaosforge.org/index.php?title=Alistair%27s_Party_Mansion\&action=edit) should you wish to do so.*

**Alistair's Party Mansion** is a [Wizard Laboratory](/Wizlab "Wizlab") thematically related to parties and the degeneration effect with rooms colored in gray, green, and white. Inside the rooms are degeneration clouds, (permanently confused) wizards, invited guests, and demonspawn corruptor bosses. The loot consists of consumables, gold, any magical staff, potions of degeneration, books, and a condenser vane.

## Contents

- [1 Summary](#Summary)
- [2 Monsters](#Monsters)
- [3 Map](#Map)
- [4 History](#History)

## Summary

Alistair's Party Mansion has many wizards, but also many "degenerate" monsters. [Potions of degeneration](/Potions_of_degeneration "Potions of degeneration") are scattered about, and [clouds](/Cloud "Cloud") of degeneration spawn indoors.

[Spellbooks](/Spellbook "Spellbook"), especially those of [Transmutations](/Transmutations "Transmutations"), can be found here. There is also a [scroll of acquirement](/Scroll_of_acquirement "Scroll of acquirement") and a [condenser vane](/Condenser_vane "Condenser vane") (if possible).

## Monsters

|                                                                                                                                                                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                                                 |                                                                                                                                                               |                                                                                                                                                                           |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| e [![Deep elf zephyrmancer.png](/images/7/70/Deep_elf_zephyrmancer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_zephyrmancer.png) **[Deep elf zephyrmancer](/Deep_elf_zephyrmancer "Deep elf zephyrmancer")** | e [![Deep elf pyromancer.png](/images/a/aa/Deep_elf_pyromancer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_pyromancer.png) **[Deep elf pyromancer](/Deep_elf_pyromancer "Deep elf pyromancer")**       | e [![Deep elf high priest.png](/images/c/cc/Deep_elf_high_priest.png)](/File:Deep_elf_high_priest.png) **[Deep elf high priest](/Deep_elf_high_priest "Deep elf high priest")** | e [![Deep elf sorcerer.png](/images/2/2b/Deep_elf_sorcerer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_sorcerer.png) **[Deep elf sorcerer](/Deep_elf_sorcerer "Deep elf sorcerer")** | X [![Tentacled starspawn.png](/images/2/25/Tentacled_starspawn.png)](/File:Tentacled_starspawn.png) **[Tentacled starspawn](/Tentacled_starspawn "Tentacled starspawn")** |
| G [![Great orb of eyes.png](/images/3/3c/Great_orb_of_eyes.png)](/File:Great_orb_of_eyes.png) **[Great orb of eyes](/Great_orb_of_eyes "Great orb of eyes")**                         | G [![Glowing orange brain.png](/images/3/39/Glowing_orange_brain.png)](/File:Glowing_orange_brain.png) **[Glowing orange brain](/Glowing_orange_brain "Glowing orange brain")** | p [![Glowing shapeshifter.png](/images/0/0b/Glowing_shapeshifter.png)](/File:Glowing_shapeshifter.png) **[Glowing shapeshifter](/Glowing_shapeshifter "Glowing shapeshifter")** | B [![Entropy weaver.png](/images/a/aa/Entropy_weaver.png)](/File:Entropy_weaver.png) **[Entropy weaver](/Entropy_weaver "Entropy weaver")**                   | H [![Sphinx.png](/images/0/0e/Sphinx.png)](/File:Sphinx.png) **[Sphinx](/Sphinx "Sphinx")**                                                                               |
| 2 [![Cacodemon.png](/images/5/58/Cacodemon.png)](/File:Cacodemon.png) **[Cacodemon](/Cacodemon "Cacodemon")**                                                                         | 2 [![Green death.png](/images/4/40/Green_death.png)](/File:Green_death.png) **[Green death](/Green_death "Green death")**                                                       | X [![Tentacled starspawn.png](/images/2/25/Tentacled_starspawn.png)](/File:Tentacled_starspawn.png) **[Tentacled starspawn](/Tentacled_starspawn "Tentacled starspawn")**       | x [![Worldbinder.png](/images/3/37/Worldbinder.png)](/File:Worldbinder.png) **[Worldbinder](/Worldbinder "Worldbinder")**                                     | 6 [![Demonspawn corrupter.png](/images/1/10/Demonspawn_corrupter.png)](/File:Demonspawn_corrupter.png) **[Corrupter](/Corrupter "Corrupter")**                            |

Two [demonspawn corrupters](/Demonspawn_corrupter "Demonspawn corrupter") wait at the end of the wizlab, at the toprightmost room.

## Map

[![Alistair minimap 029.png](/images/3/3b/Alistair_minimap_029.png)](/File:Alistair_minimap_029.png)

See [/dat/des/portals/wizlab.des:2452](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.29.0/crawl-ref/source//dat/des/portals/wizlab.des#L2452) (0.29.0) for full map.

## History

- Alistair's Party Mansion was introduced in [0.28](/0.28 "0.28").
- This wizlab was designed by [Hellmonk](https://github.com/Hellmonk).

Alistair's Party Mansion is a Wizard Laboratory thematically related to parties and the degeneration effect with rooms colored in gray, green, and white. Inside the rooms are degeneration clouds, (permanently confused) wizards, invited guests, and demonspawn corruptor bosses. The loot consists of consumables, gold, any magical staff, potions of degeneration, books, and a condenser vane.

Contents

  • 1 Summary
  • 2 Monsters
  • 3 Map
  • 4 History

Summary

Alistair's Party Mansion has many wizards, but also many "degenerate" monsters. Potions of degeneration are scattered about, and clouds of degeneration spawn indoors.

Spellbooks, especially those of Transmutations, can be found here. There is also a scroll of acquirement and a condenser vane (if possible).

Monsters

p Wizard (monster) p Necromancer (monster) g Boggart u Very ugly thing i Spriggan druid
e Deep elf zephyrmancer e Deep elf pyromancer e Deep elf high priest e Deep elf sorcerer X Tentacled starspawn
G Great orb of eyes G Glowing orange brain p Glowing shapeshifter B Entropy weaver H Sphinx
2 Cacodemon 2 Green death X Tentacled starspawn x Worldbinder 6 Corrupter

Two demonspawn corrupters wait at the end of the wizlab, at the toprightmost room.

Map

See /dat/des/portals/wizlab.des:2452 (0.29.0) for full map.

History

  • Alistair's Party Mansion was introduced in 0.28.
  • This wizlab was designed by Hellmonk.
